body.p: More specifically, respondents urged the Board to develop a standard based on SFAS 123. However, given that convergence of accounting standards was commonly given as a reason for this suggestion, the Board considered US GAAP overall, not just one aspect of it. The main pronouncements of US GAAP on share‑based payment are Accounting Principles Board Opinion No. 25 Accounting for Stock Issued to Employees, and SFAS 123.
